Changelog

  • 3.3.7 (2018-07-29)

    • Updating for the 2018 season
    • Many site-specific fixes
    • Temporarily removing expert selection, as FantasyPros now requires login

    3.3.0 (2017-11-02)

    • Added medians
    • Fixed inaccurate trendlines if the player was traded

    3.2.0 (2017-10-29)

    • Fixing more FPros data
    • Early Lineup Optimizer setup

    3.1.7 (2017-09-05)

    • Fixing Yahoo projections
    • Enabling HTTPS for fleaflicker
    • Adjustments for Rams (STL - LAR)

    3.1.6 (2017-08-16)

    • Updating for the 2017 season!
